eas_text: A civil authority has issued AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE for the following counties or areas: Gila, AZ; Arizona; Apache; Cochise; Graham; Greenlee; La Paz; Maricopa; Mohave; Navajo; Pima; Pinal; Santa Cruz; Yavapai; Yuma, AZ; at 12:58 AM ON JAN 12, 2026 Effective until 08:58 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Pima County Sheriff's Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Pima County Sheriff's Department is looking for white male, John Kerfoot, 83 years old. John was last seen driving a white 2013 Chrysler 200 with Arizona license plate P R A 2 V Z. He is 6 feet tall, 175 pounds with gray hair and brown eyes. John suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
